faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before your visit

reservation.q: Do I need to book in advance?
reservation.a: We strongly recommend booking, especially on weekends when we're busiest. You can book directly on our website or by phone.

dietary.q: Do you offer vegan and gluten-free options?
dietary.a: Absolutely! Our menu includes several vegan options and we can adapt most of our dishes for people with gluten intolerance.

groups.q: Do you accept groups and private events?
groups.a: Yes, we welcome groups up to 30 people and offer packages for birthdays, baptisms and other celebrations.

kids.a: Of course! We offer a special menu for children with adapted portions and dishes they love.

parking.a: A public parking is located 2 minutes walk away. Public transport is also very convenient to reach us.

wifi.a: Yes, we offer free and fast wifi connection for all our customers.
